faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our services, processes, and how we can help your business thrive.

questions.question: What services does EXCI-MAA provide?
questions.answer: We offer a comprehensive range of accounting, auditing, tax, and business advisory services tailored to meet the unique needs of businesses in Saudi Arabia and beyond. Our services include financial reporting, tax planning, internal auditing, and business consulting.

questions.question: How can I schedule a consultation?
questions.answer: You can schedule a consultation by calling our office, sending us an email, or using the contact form on this page. Our team will get back to you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment.

questions.question: What industries do you specialize in?
questions.answer: We have extensive experience working with various industries including healthcare, construction, retail, technology, and professional services. Our team has the expertise to handle the unique financial challenges of each sector.

questions.question: What are your business hours?
questions.answer: Our office is open from Sunday to Thursday, 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM. We are closed on Fridays and Saturdays as well as on public holidays.

questions.question: Do you offer remote or virtual services?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer both in-person and virtual consultation services to accommodate our clients' needs. Our team is equipped with secure video conferencing tools to provide the same level of service remotely.

questions.question: How do you ensure data security and confidentiality?
questions.answer: We take data security very seriously. All client information is handled with the utmost confidentiality and protected using industry-standard security measures, including encryption and secure file sharing systems.

hero.title: About EXCI-MAA
hero.subtitle: Your Trusted Financial Partner
hero.description: With over 27 years of excellence in financial services, EXCI-MAA has been a trusted partner for businesses across multiple countries, providing expert accounting, auditing, and consulting services.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: Our primary mission is to support and accompany companies operating in the African market toward financial excellence. Leveraging deep knowledge of both for-profit and non-profit sectors, we deliver advisory, statutory audit, and consulting engagements tailored to every organization size.
mission.description2: Our solutions are designed to address the specific needs of businesses across the African continent, providing end-to-end service and real added value—at a fair budget. Our multidisciplinary and multicultural team ensures bespoke support, adapted to the scale and capabilities of your structure.

story.title: Our Story
story.description1: EXCI-MAA was founded by experts in audit, accounting, taxation, business development, management information systems, and law. With a presence in Canada, the United States, France, the United Kingdom, and across Africa, we bring international expertise tailored to each local context.
story.description2: We operate across the entire value chain of our clients' activities, ensuring transparency and compliance with stakeholders. Our firm accompanies organizations in multiple countries through a strong network and on-the-ground teams, offering proximity service and solutions adapted to local realities.
story.description3: Today, we continue to expand our footprint while staying true to our founding principles: excellence, integrity, and impact. From statutory and contractual audits to risk management and personalized advisory, our teams deliver durable, effective missions that drive sustainable results.
